articles.author: Steve Gutterman
articles.title: Putin Sends Signals To The West On Ukraine Ahead Of Trump's New Term - Radio Free Europe / Radio Liberty
articles.description: In a marathon Q&A session, Russian President Vladimir Putin dangled the prospect of concessions on Ukraine before audiences in Kyiv, Washington, and the West. But he attached numerous caveats to the idea of compromise.
articles.content: Vladimir Putins end-of-year Q&A session with reporters and the public is billed as a chance for Russian citizens to ask the president about the issues that matter to them most. But while much of … [+4179 chars]

articles.author: Julia Davis
articles.title: Fantasyland: Russian General ‘Assassinated by the British’ - Center for European Policy Analysis
articles.description: The Kremlin and its mouthpieces are struggling to swallow a terrible truth — Ukraine’s agents regularly penetrate Russia’s security state.
articles.content:
Two things have become clear since the assassination of Lt Gen Igor Kirillov, head of Russias Radiation, Chemical, and Biological Protection Forces, in a bomb attack in Moscow on December 17.
